Affix.Name: Obsidian Codex
Affix.Desc: While the equipping character is in Nightsoul's Blessing and is on the field, their DMG dealt is increased by 15%.

Affix.Name: Obsidian Codex
Affix.Desc: After the equipping character consumes 1 Nightsoul point while on the field, CRIT Rate increases by 40% for 6s. This effect can trigger once every second.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Pre-Banquet of the Contenders
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A vessel that seems to have been made by twisting and forming stone in a seemingly whimsical fashion. But it is an open question as to who possesses such strength...

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Root of the Spirit-Marrow
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A feathered accessory made in imitation of an ancient dragon's wing. Perhaps it was once a memento of some forgotten history.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Crown of the Saints
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A crown made of obsidian that in ancient times was used in coronation ceremonies by noble tribal kings.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Reckoning of the Xenogenic
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A flower meticulously carved from black crystal. It emits a mysterious light at night.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Myths of the Night Realm
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A mysterious ritual element that is neither a timepiece nor a compass. Nowadays, no one has any idea what it is used for.
